brief.content-text:
The diagram depicts a corporate network where routers are used to control traffic flows between end users, DMZ's, server farms, and the Internet.

One worker sitting at his workstation thinks to himself, "My data connection is very fast!"

Another worker sitting at her workstation is thinking, "The quality of this V o IP call is really good!"

A sinister-looking character trying to access the network via the Internet thinks to himself, "Why can I not get into this network?"
